name: FidelityInvestments
0:
”Alexa, ask Fidelity for a market update”
”portfolio events”
”show me the market movers”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fidelity
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Fidelity skill helps you stay connected to the market. Start with, “Alexa, launch Fidelity.” Then say:
"Portfolio Events" — to hear about events in your portfolio.
“Get market update”— to hear how the DOW, NASDAQ, and S&P 500 are doing.
“Show me market movers”— to find out which stocks are the most active, the top gainers, and top losers. 
"Get a quote"— to get the most recent stock price (Quotes are delayed by at least 15 minutes).
“How much are others saving in their 401(k)?” — to hear the average 401(k) balances and contribution rates.
"Get my tax forms" — to hear information about tax forms (compatible with account linking).
"Play podcasts" — to hear our featured podcasts.

746622.7.0
